review: Dr. Hegde has a way around with the little ones. He seems to wear a combination of hats for both his wards and those who come along with them. He's a doctor, a consultant, a confidant, a friend, a magician with the syringe (hardly seen my grandson cry after he has been picked), a well wisher (prescribes medicines on SOS basis & doesn't recommend unnecessary tests) and an expert trusted advisor! My appreciations to him for being there for my grandson anytime he's needed him, for making the most appropriate recommendation (as if my grandson were his son) and more importantly for being attentive to the real needs of my grandchild. Thank you!

We usually go to Dr Radhakrishna Hedge for all our concerns related to our kids , he is one of those Dr wer u feel u r very much safe and even kids like him a lot , gives just the required medicines and not the big list or unnecessary tests . On time , **** **** ****** *** ****** ************* ****

Really nice doctor he patiently gives time, explain even vaccination details, ***** ***** ** ********* ************ ****** ** ******* very polite and humble doctor. After every vaccination, he says sorry to my son Agastya, and talk to baby not like other doctors who simply insert injections.
Thank you so much doctor
Dr. Is very caring and shows sense of urgency and importance. Explains the issue very well and in detail.

Unfortunately the doctor was unavailable during this visit , but he has been very good with our kid . His calm demeanour and swift action helps my kid many a times. Highly recommend Dr. Radhakrishna Hedge.
